abstract: Trial of suspected Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev is ready to start in Boston after defense fails to to achieve plea bargain deal; federal prosecutors seem bent on seeking death penalty for terrorist bombing that angered and traumatized nation.
lead_paragraph: Not since Sept. 11, 2001, has an act of terrorism wreaked such havoc on an American city. Now, the trial of alleged Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev is set to begin as the nation watches.

byline.contributor: Samantha Storey contributed reporting from New York.

snippet: Not since Sept. 11, 2001, has an act of terrorism wreaked such havoc on an American city. Now, the trial of alleged Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev is set to begin as the nation watches.

headline.main: Boston Is Eager to Begin Marathon Bombing Trial, and to End It
headline.print_headline: Boston Is Eager to Begin Marathon Bomb Trial, and to End It
